articles.title: Those Who Dare Hurt DPRK's Dignity and System Will Pay High Price: Spokesman for C.C., DFRK
articles.content:
Those Who Dare Hurt DPRK's Dignity and System Will Pay High Price: Spokesman for C.C., DFRK
						
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea (DFRK) issued a statement on Friday branding the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group's act of malignantly hurting the dignity and social system of the DRPK and making last-ditch efforts as a politically-motivated provocation against it and a poor behavior of those who are seized with the daydream of "collapse of the north's social system".
					 The spokesman went on: 
					
					  It is centuries-old tragicomedy that the U.S. and the puppet group harbor such a foolish daydream as "collapse" and "change".
					
					 The absurdity and dastardly nature of the story about "unstable social system" and "theory of bringing down the north" touted by the U.S. and the puppet group have already been brought to light, proving them to be nonsense of confrontational maniacs who have no elementary judgment.
					
					 They should clearly understand that the "collapse of north's social system" is no more than a daydream that cannot come true even after the lapse of a century and that they can get nothing through slander on the DPRK.
					
					 They are entirely to blame for the anti-DPRK accusations spread by the conservative media and riff-raffs as they totally deny the DPRK's socialist political system and resort to the vicious policy of confrontation while dreaming of "collapse".
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that such provocative action will fan up mistrust and hostility and can become a fuse that may cause an unexpected situation beyond control in relations between the north and the south.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities should ponder over what catastrophic consequences their word playing may bring. 
					
					 Those who dare hurt the dignity and social system of the DPRK will be made to pay a very high price.

articles.title: Meeting of Co-Chairmen of Pomminryon Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Co-Chairmen of Pomminryon Held
						
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The 15th meeting of co-chairmen of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) was held on Friday by way of exchanging facsimile messages among the north and the south and overseas headquarters.
					 The meeting discussed the action program of Pomminryon to glorify this significant year marking the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation as the year of a landmark turn in opening up a broad avenue to independent reunification.
					
					 A report was made at the meeting.
					
					 The report said that Pomminryon has led the reunification movement of the fellow countrymen, meeting the challenges of anti-reunification forces without the slightest vacillation and hesitation true to its responsibility and duty before the times and the nation. 
					
					 It noted that Pomminryon fully supported the appeal adopted at the joint meeting of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK that reflected the unanimous desire and aspiration of all the Koreans after the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and independent reunification. 
					
					 It indicated tasks and ways for Pomminryon to hold high the slogan "Let the whole nation join efforts to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification in this year of the 70th anniversary of national liberation!"
					
					 It stressed that Pomminryon marking its 25th founding anniversary should creditably fulfill its responsibility and honorable mission as vanguard for national reunification and standard-bearer of great national unity and thus glorify this significant year marking the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation as the year of a landmark turn in opening up a broad avenue to independent reunification.
					
					 A joint resolution was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Pomminryon Renews Its Will to Open Broad Avenue to Independent Reunification
articles.content:
Pomminryon Renews Its Will to Open Broad Avenue to Independent Reunification 
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A joint resolution was adopted at the 15th meeting of co-chairmen of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) held on Friday. 
					 The north, the south and overseas headquarters of Pomminryon in the joint resolution called for holding high the slogan "Let the whole nation join efforts to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification in this year of the 70th anniversary of national liberation!", and said:
					
					1. Pomminryon will launch a nationwide movement for reunification by firmly joining hands with Koreans of different social standings at home and abroad to glorify 2015 as a year of general offensive to be specially recorded in the history of the nation, a year of drastic turn and a year of great victory. 
					
					Pomminryon will imbue Koreans from all walks of life with the strong spirit of self-esteem, Korean nation-first spirit that the nation should be given top priority and nothing is impossible for Koreans when they pool their strength and wisdom, and dynamically promote the great national unity under the banner of By Our Nation Itself. 
					
					2. Pomminryon will invariably hold aloft the July 4 joint statement, the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, common charter of the nation and great programmes for reunification, as the lifeline for independent reunification. 
					
					It will make efforts to ensure that a national joint event involving Koreans from all walks of life in the north and the south and overseas may be held on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration and the 70th anniversary of national liberation and make it a nationwide rally for reunification promoting the great national unity in name and reality. 
					
					3. Pomminryon will conduct energetic activities to create favorable environment and climate for mending the north-south relations. 
					
					In particular, it will resolutely check all confrontation moves such as campaigns for infringing upon the other side's dignity and system and slandering them, "human rights" racket and leaflet scattering obstructive to the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and work hard to make the "May 24 steps" lifted.
					
					4. Pomminryon will exert every effort to oppose war and create peaceful environment. 
					
					For the present, it will wage a struggle to check Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises, intensify the actions for the withdrawal of the U.S. forces and decisively reject foreign forces' interference in the internal affairs of the Korean nation.
					
					5.  Pomminryon will strongly counter the fascist crackdown upon the pro-reunification patriotic forces and resolutely hold in check the attempt to forcibly dissolve the South Headquarters of Pomminryon by branding it as "an illegal organization" and "enemy-benefiting organization".
					
					And it will strive hard to the last for the repeal of the anti-national, anti-reunification and anti-human rights laws including the "Security Law" and the release of all pro-reunification patriotic figures including the unreasonably arrested members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon.

articles.title: Performance Given by Art Squad of C.C., Youth League
articles.content:
Performance Given by Art Squad of C.C., Youth League
						
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League at the Central Youth Hall on Friday to mark February 8 when the Korean regular armed forces were founded.
					 Put on the stage were colorful numbers including small chorus "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung", poem and story-telling "We Will Convey Long the Undying Feats Performed for Army Building", female quartet "Nilliri for Songun" and male quartet "Song of Pride of Guards Unit".
					
					 Performers praised Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for firmly defending the dignity and sovereignty of the country and laying the eternal foundation for the prosperity of Songun Korea by building the regular revolutionary forces. 
					
					 Diverse numbers fully reflected the will and stamina of the youth to wipe out all the U.S. imperialists and south Korean group of traitors and surely accomplish the historic cause of national reunification.
					
					 Put on the stage were numbers demonstrating the spirit of the youth to protect supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the cost of their lives and emerge victorious in all fields for defending socialism and building a thriving nation.
					
					 The performance was enjoyed by Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials concerned, officials of the youth league and youth and students.

articles.title: Art Performance Given by Agricultural Workers
articles.content:
Art Performance Given by Agricultural Workers
 Sunchon, February 6 (KCNA) -- An art performance was given by agricultural workers at the Ri Su Bok Youth Cooperative Farm in Sunchon City, South Phyongan Province on Friday on the occasion of the birthday of the Korean regular armed forces (Feb. 8).
					 The performance began with chorus "Song of the Korean People's Army" and female solo and chorus "Cantata to Marshal Kim Il Sung". Put on the stage were colorful numbers praising President Kim Il Sung for setting a brilliant example in building the revolutionary armed forces in the era of independence.
					
					 The performers presented colorful numbers reflecting the heroic feats of the KPA which reliably defended the dignity of the DPRK and the gains of socialism under his leadership.
					
					 Poem and song "The Country I Am Defending" and other numbers touched a chord with the audience as the numbers made them recollect the history of the Songun revolutionary activities of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also put on the stage were choruses "Forward to the Final Victory" and "We Will Defend General Kim Jong Un at the Cost of Our Lives".
					
					 Among the audience were Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the C.C., the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea, officials concerned and agricultural workers in Sunchon City.

articles.title: Feats of Kim Jong Suk for Building of Regular Army
articles.content:
Feats of Kim Jong Suk for Building of Regular Army
						
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK look back upon the immortal feats performed by anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk who made contribution to the building of regular armed forces with the approach of February 8.
					 Kim Jong Suk visited more than 320 units of the Korean People's Army till the last moments of her life after the country's liberation and gave teachings over 420 occasions in order to make sure that the Korean revolutionary armed forces honorably fulfilled its most important mission as the army of the leader, the party and the people which carried forward the brilliant traditions of the anti-Japanese struggle.
					
					 She visited Pyongyang Institute more than 30 times and left her sacred footprints in schools and training centers at all levels including the Central Security Officers School.
					
					 She participated in the ceremony of opening Pyongyang Institute accompanying President Kim Il Sung on Feb. 23, Juche 35 (1946). She told the officials of the institute that it is the one of the President which brings up the national cadres of new Korea, stressing all education should be conducted with the President's revolutionary idea as guidelines.
					
					 She paid deep attention to establishing Juche in the building of the regular army in conformity with the intention of the President.
					
					 On the day of the opening of the institute, talking to officials of the institute, she stressed that the military education should not mechanically follow the style of other country but be conducted our own style as was done in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk made great efforts to build the modern regular army equipped with all services and arms, true to the President's line of founding the army. 
					
					 The KPA parade took place with splendor in Pyongyang on Feb. 8, 1948, proclaiming the birth of the regular revolutionary armed forces with the attendance of the President.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk, watching the columns of the parade marching past the platform in fine array, said that the KPA should become the army of the President forever.
					
					 The KPA could demonstrate its might as the powerful Paektusan revolutionary army century after century and dynamically advance the revolutionary cause of Juche, thanks to the historical Feb. 8 which was brought about by the outstanding foresightedness of the brilliant commanders of Mt. Paektu and their immortal feats for building the army.

articles.title: New Waste-water Treatment Technology Proves Effective
articles.content:
New Waste-water Treatment Technology Proves Effective
						
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The Microbiological Research Institute under the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK has developed a new technology for purifying industrial waste water.
					 In this regard, Dr. Kang Chun Ryong, a section chief of the institute, told KCNA:
					
					 The new technology, based on absorbability of microbe, makes it possible to remove mercury and heavy metal ion from industrial waste water.
					
					 It has already recognized by technical groups of different countries for its high effectiveness.

articles.title: News Analyst on History of DPRK-U.S. Nuclear Standoff
articles.content:
News Analyst on History of DPRK-U.S. Nuclear Standoff
						
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The United States is getting evermore hysteric in its hostile policy towards the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 On February 3, the U.S. ambassador to south Korea said that the DPRK should return to international community by giving up its policy of pursuing simultaneous nuclear and economic development or face continued sanctions and isolation and that it would face growing costs if it continues to stick to its nuclear weapons program.
					
					 From the outset of the year, politicians and military bosses of the U.S., including its president, have cried out for "additional sanctions" on the DPRK and its "collapse", getting hell-bent on the moves for military pressure.
					
					 But the history shows who will have to pay growing costs in the nuclear confrontation between the DPRK and the U.S.
					
					 In fact, the persistent U.S. threat of preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK compelled the latter to have access to nuclear weapons.
					
					 It was not until the DPRK's successful launch of satellite that the Clinton administration of the U.S., which had insisted on "ad hoc inspection" of the DPRK's nuclear facilities, clinging to the "rumor of collapse in three years", expressed its willingness for improved relations.
					
					 The Bush administration listed the DPRK as an "axis of evil" and spread a rumor of its "uranium enrichment" to put pressure upon it over the nuclear issue. But such pressure led the DPRK to successful nuclear test and possession of nuclear deterrent and, consequently, the U.S. could not but delete it from the list of "sponsors of terrorism" and put an end to the application of the "Trading with the Enemy Act" to it.
					
					 However, the present Obama administration of the U.S. has tightened its hostile policy towards the DPRK, brining about unimaginable consequences. 
					
					It adopted a policy of "strategic patience" envisaging that tightened isolation and blockade would lead the DPRK to dismantlement of its nukes and changes. To cope with it, the DPRK came to arm itself with diversified precision nuclear striking means and advanced a strategic line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					 The DPRK National Defence Commission in a statement on Feb. 4 declared the stand that since the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK is getting extremely ferocious, the army and people of the DPRK would take stronger counteraction of justice and write the last page of the U.S. history of shameful defeat about its final ruin exactly on the U.S. land.
					
					 In this regard, a Russian expert on the Korean affairs said that it is hard to rule out the possibility of war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Even think tanks of the U.S. claimed that the Obama administration's policy of "strategic patience" has led the DPRK to the intensified development of nukes.
					
					 The U.S. should squarely face up the history and reality.

articles.title: Feats of KPA Guards Units (5)
articles.content:
Feats of KPA Guards Units (5)
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The Seoul Guards 3rd Infantry Division of the Korean People's Army (KPA) is well-known for having performed distinguished feats in the 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War.
					 From the beginning of the war, the division moved in the main front, making big contributions to liberating Phochon, Uijongbu, Seoul and Taejon.
					
					 In July Juche 39 (1950), the unit was awarded the title of Guards.
					
					 The division dealt deadly blow to the U.S. aggression forces and the south Korean puppet army in many battles it fought in Yongdong, Kimchon, Mt. Suam and other areas. It also took part in the Raktong River-crossing operation.
					
					 In a battle to seize Height 339 in Kosong area in July 1953, the unit produced seven awardees of the title of DPRK Hero, greatly contributing to the conclusion of the war in victory for the DPRK.
					
					 When visiting this unit in December 2000, leader Kim Jong Il praised the feats it performed in the war, saying that its colors is associated with the precious soul of revolutionary forerunners who dedicated their lives to the Party and the leader, the motherland and people.
					
					 Early in January this year, Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the KPA, said with satisfaction that there is something extraordinary in the guards unit when soldiers of the division destroyed the pillbox target under sudden conditions in a recoilless gun firing contest of sub-units directly under the infantry divisions of the first echelons of the KPA frontline corps.
					
					 The supreme commander personally awarded a diploma of crack-shot to the division and crack-shot medals and badges to its soldiers. And he noted that the first master gunners for 2015 emerged from the unit where the spirit of a-match-for-a-hundred was created and that it fought bravely for the Party, revolution, country and its people in the last Fatherland Liberation War, urging its soldiers to steadily glorify the honor of guards unit by inheriting the tradition of their forerunners.

articles.title: Feats of KPA Guards Units (6)
articles.content:
Feats of KPA Guards Units (6)
						
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The Kang Kon Guards 2nd Infantry Division of the Korean People's Army is well-known for having performed distinguished feats in the battle to defend Height 1211 during the last Fatherland Liberation War.
					 By employing the unique military tactics indicated by President Kim Il Sung, the division contributed to liberating many parts of south Korea, including Chunchon, Kaphyong, Ansong, Jinchon and Chongju, in the 1950-1953 War.
					
					 In the second half of 1951, the unit fought death-defying battles on the Height 1211 in the eastern front, making distinguished contribution to foiling the enemy's "summer and autumn offensives".
					
					 In the war, the division witnessed a number of awardees of the title of DPRK Hero, including Ri Su Bok and An Yong Ae, and killed or captured tens of thousands of enemy troops while destroying many pieces of enemy combat equipment.
					
					 The unit was awarded the title of Guards on January 27, 1952.
					
					 When inspecting it in November Juche 94 (2005), leader Kim Jong Il highly appreciated the heroic feats its servicepersons performed in the war.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls on Agricultural Workers to Bring about Fresh Boost in Production
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls on Agricultural Workers to Bring about Fresh Boost in Production 
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday dedicates an article to the first anniversary of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Bring About Innovations in Agricultural Production under the Unfurled Banner of the Socialist Rural Theses". 
					 The work published on February 6, Juche 103 (2014) indicates the way of dynamically stepping up the building of an economic power by bringing about a fresh turn in the agricultural production, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Over the past one year officials and other people in agricultural field positively applied the precious guideline set forth in the work to farming and gained good successes and experience helpful to big boost in agricultural production. 
					
					 This is a clear proof of the validity and vitality of the agricultural policy of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Juche-based farming methods. 
					
					 A rosy prospect is being opened in the DPRK under the wise leadership of the party to bring about a fresh turn in agricultural production as required by the regional features and the world trend of development. The Sepho area is now being successfully turned into a huge stockbreeding base and many stockbreeding bases, greenhouses and mushroom houses have appeared in different parts of the country. 
					
					 Scientists of the DPRK have worked heart and soul to solve urgent scientific and technological problems arising in agricultural production. Agricultural workers are busy making farming preparations for this year, bearing deep in mind that the nation's increased grain production alone will help improve the people's living standard. 
					
					 All the fields of the cooperative farms across the country will surely yield rich harvest thanks to the officials and people in the agricultural domain who are working hard to put into practice the noble intention of Kim Jong Un to make hurrah for socialism heard from the dinner table of every family by drastically increasing the agricultural production in the near future. 
					
					 All the officials and people in the agricultural field should regard the ideas clarified by Kim Jong Un in his work as their lifeline and fully embody them and thus bring about bumper crops this significant year and proudly greet the grand festival in October.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Carrying on Drive to Achieve Prosperity of Country
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Carrying on Drive to Achieve Prosperity of Country
						
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday in an editorial says that every citizen of the country should answer with pride the question raised by the present era and the country "What did you dedicate to your country?"
					 The editorial goes on:
					
					  A thriving nation is neither a present of someone nor an accidental product of the trend of the times. 
					
					 The building of a thriving nation is a nation-wide patriotic work which requires all the people across the country, regardless of sex and age, to turn out as one. Those who were born on this land and breathe air and drink water of the country should live an honorable life, ready to answer the above-said question.
					
					 Only when everybody works hard with high awareness to make this land fertile  even with a small amount of compost and contribute even a bit to the prosperity of the country, the cause of building a thriving nation will weather hardships and trials and win victories.
					
					 Now is the time for everybody to bear in mind the above-said question every moment and make redoubled efforts. 
					
					 If one fails to make patriotic devotion in the present stirring era when the country is dashing ahead towards final victory, one will regret for this till one's death.
					
					 All officials, party members, service personnel and people should respond to the call of the party and the country, times and history through their total dedication, not just in words.
					
					 Let us all work hard for the prosperity of the dear motherland-- the great Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea, wholeheartedly answering the question.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Evading Blame for Anti-DPRK Leaflet Scattering
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Evading Blame for Anti-DPRK Leaflet Scattering
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The boss of the Ministry of Unification of south Korea on Feb. 3 insisted that anti-DPRK leaflet scattering by human scum is an "aspect of freedom of expression" and "not a matter which should be put under control by force".
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article in this regard:
					
					 It is sophism that the south Korean puppet group claimed "there is neither legal ground nor regulation to check" the said leaflet scattering.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities have the will to mend the inter-Korean relations, they can certainly block the leaflet scattering operations.
					
					  However, they are evading their blame for it while talking about "freedom of expression" now that the inter-Korean relations are in the grip of a serious crisis.
					
					 Emboldened by this, human scum are getting more frantic with those operations with the backing of the U.S. despite domestic and foreign public denunciation.
					
					 The reality goes to prove that the puppet group of traitors is to blame for pushing the inter-Korean relations to a catastrophe again as it is keen on the racket for confrontation with compatriots including anti-DPRK leaflet scattering.
					
					 It is a daydream to try to do harm to the invincible DPRK through despicable leaflet-scattering operations as all its service personnel and people are single-mindedly united.
					
					 As already declared, the DPRK will never pardon maniacs hurting the dignity and social system of the DPRK but mercilessly punish them.

articles.title: Minju Joson Warns U.S. Not to Go Reckless
articles.content:
Minju Joson Warns U.S. Not to Go Reckless
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, U.S. President Obama slandered the DPRK as the "most isolated, severed and cruel dictatorial state" and cried out for "bringing down" it earlier through cyber-attack on it.
					 Minju Joson Friday in a commentary says this is nothing but a revelation of horror and fear of destruction felt by those taken aback by the daily growing political and military might and economic potentials of the DPRK dynamically advancing along the road of independence, Songun and socialism, and last-ditch efforts of those with their ruin at hand.
					
					 The U.S. is incriminating the socialist construction and socialist system in the DPRK and is working with bloodshot eyes to undermine the socialist ideology and bring down the socialist system by force, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is the conclusion drawn by the army and people of the DPRK in the course of decades-long stand-off between the DPRK and the U.S. that there is neither need to sit for dialogue with such guys nor any willingness to do so.
					
					 A stick is fit for a rabid dog. The gangster-like U.S. imperialists have to be dealt only with the arms of Mt. Paektu as they are keen on kicking up the racket for escalating the confrontation with the DPRK after losing their reason and face.
					
					 We have already set the strategic goal of bringing the bilateral stand-off to a close in the U.S., a cesspool of evils, not in our homeland, and have rounded off a roadmap for it.
					
					 The U.S. confrontational maniacs should clearly know that the time of nightmare is drawing nearer hour by hour when the U.S. mainland will turn into theatres of final battles between the DPRK and the U.S. and that a miserable fate is awaiting the U.S.

articles.title: Pro-U.S. Lackeys Are Bound to Face Severe Punishment: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Pro-U.S. Lackeys Are Bound to Face Severe Punishment: KCNA Commentary 
						
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Channel A broadcasting service of south Korea on Feb. 5, at the prodding of the U.S. and south Korean diehard conservative group, openly slandered the just stand of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to take the toughest counteraction against the U.S. and their strong will to annihilate it as "one for reinforcing the system" and "one for cultivating hostility towards the U.S. through brain-washing education."
					 To top it all, it said "the north is spreading the false story" that the U.S. imperialists used germ weapons in the Korean War and they are deploying chemical weapons in Okinawa in a desperate bid to shield their monstrous germ warfare. 
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK declared that they would inflict the most miserable and final doom on the U.S. making desperate efforts to "bring down" the ideology and social system of the DPRK, and have turned out as one in the just retaliatory actions against the U.S.
					
					 This is the decisive and solemn declaration of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to settle accounts in the U.S., a cesspool of evils, with the wolf-like U.S. imperialists who bring unspeakable misfortune and pain to the Koreans down through generations. 
					
					 However, the ultra-right conservative Channel A hurt the mounting spirit of the DPRK service personnel and people with the above-said outbursts. This is an intolerable behavior escalating the confrontation and a blatant challenge to the will of the Koreans to take retaliatory actions against the U.S.
					
					 Lurking behind this is the sinister intention of the conservative forces to lay the blame for the situation on the Korean peninsula driven into an extreme phase due to the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK getting extremely tense at the door of it. 
					
					 It is well known that in the past conservative media became venal trumpeters for the U.S. and south Korean authorities and cooked up false stories to hurt the fellow countrymen and chill the atmosphere for mending the north-south relations. 
					
					 Among them Channel A has earned an ill-fame for airing extreme anti-reunification and traitorous programs. 
					
					 This time it shielded once again the hideous germ warfare committed by the U.S. imperialists against the Korean nation during the Korean War, once again bringing to light its true colors as a faithful dog of the U.S., cursed media for confrontation with the fellow countrymen and the media showing extra zeal in hatching plots. 
					
					 The monstrous germ warfare perpetrated by the U.S. against the Korean people during the Korean War baffled human imagination. 
					
					 The U.S. dropped all kinds of germ bombs over 169 areas of the northern half of Korea through a total of 804 air raids from early January to March, 1952 with hundreds of planes involved. It also used chemical weapons which were banned by international law in cities and counties of the northern half of Korea and front areas from February, 1951 to July, 1953.
					
					 This is just a tip of iceberg of the germ and chemical warfare committed by the U.S.
					
					 The undisguised germ warfare and the chemical warfare perpetrated by the U.S. in stealthy and crafty methods were the most horrible crimes committed by it against the Korean people and mankind and heinous crimes committed in an organized and premeditated manner according to the policy of the U.S. government.
					
					 The truth about the U.S. shuddering germ warfare was clearly exposed by the investigation conducted by the international fact-finding group and lots of testimonies and evidence.
					
					 Moreover, the original text of a report made by a UK bio-chemist on the germ warfare committed by the U.S. against the Korean people in 1952 was opened to the public recently, stunning the world once again.
					
					 Unspeakable was the damage suffered by the south Korean people due to the U.S. monstrous germ and chemical warfare and massacres of civilians.
					
					 Nevertheless, Channel A committed such an act of treachery.
					
					 This reckless behavior can be conducted only by a group of traitors who have not iota of national soul. It is nothing but a poor jargon of the colonial stooges to calm down the ever-mounting anti-American sentiment and patronize their master, the U.S.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group is shielding the U.S. with plots and fabrications against the DPRK by setting in motion reptile media including Channel A. This will only reveal the despicable true colors of confrontation maniacs and pro-U.S. stooges.
					
					 The puppet group should clearly know that with no rhetoric can it shake the will of the army and people of the DPRK all out in the final sacred war with the gangster-like U.S.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK have already declared that they would mete out a stern punishment not only to the U.S. but to the riff-raffs of Channel A keen on anti-DPRK plots in league with the aggressors and the puppet conservative group, its backstage manipulator. 
					
					 Pro-U.S. sycophants and lackeys are bound to face a stern judgment while the U.S. final doom is drawing nearer.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Fascist Suppression of Sit-in Strikers under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Fascist Suppression of Sit-in Strikers under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- South Korean public is strongly denouncing the puppet group of traitors' fascist suppression of sit-in strikers protesting against the building of a Jeju naval base.
					 The Kangjong Village Society, the All-Island People's Measure Committee for Checking Jeju Military Base and the Measure Committee for Checking Building of Jeju Naval Base in south Korea held a joint press conference on Feb. 2.
					
					 At the press conference they held that the military authorities showed only barbarous violence by forcibly dismantling the venue of sit-in of residents in Kangjong village and public activists on Jeju Island on Jan. 31.
					
					 The Center for Peace and Disarmament of the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society in a statement on the same day condemned the military authorities' forcible suppression.
					
					 It demanded an immediate halt to the construction of the base.
					
					 The Jeju Provincial Committee of the Democratic Alliance for New Politics, an opposition party, on Feb. 2 demanded the military immediately set free the inhabitants who were walked away during the reckless suppression by huge police force.
					
					 Members of the Jeju Provincial Assembly on Feb. 1 denounced the military for forcibly dismantling the venue of the sit-in strike.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Organization Introduces DPRK's Scientists and Technicians
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Organization Introduces DPRK's Scientists and Technicians
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Koreans in Australia made public an article on January 16 introducing the DPRK's scientists and technicians who are dynamically waging the drive for breaking through the cutting edge true to the Workers' Party of Korea's policy for attaching importance to science and technology.
					 The article said:
					
					 The DPRK is working miracles and innovations in the field of science and technology to promote the rehabilitation and development of the economy.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year address underscored the need to give definite precedence to science and technology and effect an upswing in building a socialist economic giant and highly civilized nation.
					
					 The scientists and technicians who keenly feel the advantages of the party's policy have achieved lots of successes through the campaign of intelligence.
					
					 The slogan which was held up by them is the drive of breaking through the cutting edge.
					
					 First of all, they have conducted the researches to tap the foundation of the independent economy and all potentialities and solved many scientific and technical issues arising in ensuring the domestic acquisition of raw and other materials and modernizing equipment.
					
					 The possessors of high national self-respect and pluck full of ambition of overtaking the world are breaking through the cutting edge with youthful vigor while learning after the spirit of their leader.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Nigerian Body on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Nigerian Body on Its Website
						
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work  "Let Us Expedite the Construction of the Livestock Breeding Base in the Sepho Area and Bring about a New Turn in Developing Animal Husbandry" was posted by the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on its website on Jan. 30.
					 The work, published on Jan. 28, Juche 104 (2015), deals with the idea that the issue of food should be resolved by not only doing farming well but also developing the livestock breeding and fishing industry, and with the tasks and ways of developing the livestock breeding.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Tunisia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Tunisia
						
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A Tunisian preparatory committee for marking the 73rd birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Tunis on Jan. 30.
					 Jalilla el Fersi, secretary general of the Tunisia-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to hold political and cultural events to praise the noble revolutionary career and undying feats of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his birth anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Iran
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Iran
						
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran for marking the 73rd birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Teheran on Feb. 1.
					 Hamid Reza Taraghi, vice-general secretary of the party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to hold colorful political and cultural events on the occasion of Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Personages of UK, Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Personages of UK, Ethiopia
						
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held in London, UK and by branches of the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism from Jan. 27 to 31 in the run-up to the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain said in a speech that Kim Jong Il was born in the secret camp of Mt. Paektu on Feb. 16, 1942 and grew up during the great anti-Japanese war and the fierce Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Under his leadership the Korean people could withstand the worst ordeals and difficulties after the demise of President Kim Il Sung, the general secretary said.
					
					 The chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy praised Kim Jong Il for developing the DPRK into a powerful state possessed of nuclear deterrent with his Songun politics.
					
					 His exploits for the Korean people and progressive humankind are great and his august name will shed its rays forever, the chairman noted.
					
					 The chief of a branch of the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said in a report that the greatest feat Kim Jong Il performed was that he defended socialism and ushered in a new heyday of the socialist cause.
					
					 His undying exploits will be kept in the hearts of progressive people, the chief added.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar in the UK.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed in Different Countries 
						
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Diverse events took place in different countries to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star). 
					 The People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party of Kyrgyzstan held a meeting, the Communist Party of Tajikistan a seminar, the Ministry of Health of Angola and a construction company in Cabinda Province of Angola an explanation meeting and lecture and a Korean medical center in Nigeria a film show on Jan. 29 and 30. 
					
					 A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party and chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Kyrgyzstan, said the politico-ideological position and military position of the DPRK have been strengthened in every way and a turning phase opened thanks to the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The birthday of Kim Jong Il will be immortal in the hearts of the Korean people and other progressives of the world, he added. 
					
					 Sh. Shabdolov, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, said Kim Jong Il made sure that the Workers' Party of Korea attached great significance to achieving unity in thinking and purpose of all party members based on the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung from the very day when he started his work at the Central Committee of the WPK. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated the Songun politics as the basic political mode under socialism in the 1990s, defeating the imperialists' threats and challenges and leading socialism to victory, he noted, adding:
					
					 Today the Korean people are working hard to bolster up the national power and achieve independent reunification at an early date under the wise leadership of respected Comrade Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 At the events in Angola speakers highly praised the undying exploits Kim Jong Il performed for the times and history.

articles.title: British Organizations Denounce Anti-DPRK Leaflet Scattering Operation
articles.content:
British Organizations Denounce Anti-DPRK Leaflet Scattering Operation 
						
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK made public a joint statement on January 22 in denunciation of the anti-DPRK leaflet scattering by human scum in south Korea. 
					 The joint statement said:
					
					 Human scum in south Korea conducted anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operation with the backstage manipulation of the U.S. and at the connivance of the south Korean authorities. This is extremely provocative and reckless one as the operation was made at a time when the DPRK is making sincere efforts to defuse the tension, improve the north-south relations and create the atmosphere for reunification. 
					
					 Even south Korean people strongly demand the immediate halt to the leaflet scattering. 
					
					 "Freedom of expression" much touted by the south Korean authorities should not be a pretext dividing a nation. 
					
					 Plot-breeders of the U.S. were involved in the leaflet scattering. 
					
					 This goes to prove that the U.S. is the chieftain blocking the struggle of the Korean people for peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 Lurking behind this is the sinister intention of the U.S. to ignite another Korean war through such plots and use south Korean people as cannon fodder in the war. 
					
					 The plot-breeders of the U.S. "human rights foundation" should go home at once, clearly understanding that their acts spoil the atmosphere of dialogue.

articles.title: FDRP acusa a EE.UU. y autoridades surcoreanas de calumniar a la RPDC
articles.content:
FDRP acusa a EE.UU. y autoridades surcoreanas de calumniar a la RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ACNC) -- En estos dias, Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos calumnian perversamente la dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC, lo cual es una grave provocacion politica a la RPDC y acto miserable de los que estan sonando todavia con el "derrumbe del regimen norcoreano".
					Asi senala el portavoz del Comite Central del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria en su declaracion publicada hoy y prosigue:
					
					Es una tragicomedia del siglo el hecho de que EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos abrigaran todavia alguna esperanza sobre el "derrumbe" y el "cambio".
					
					En cuanto al "regimen inestable" y la "teoria de derrumbe del Norte" de que hablan tanto ellos, se conocio ya ante todo el mundo su caracter absurdo e intrigante.
					
					Esas palabras no pasan de ser un delirio de los maniacos de enfrentamiento que no tienen ni la elemental capacidad de juzgar.
					
					EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos deben tener bien presente que el "derrumbe del regimen del Norte" es un sueno irrealizable y no podran obtener nada con la calumnia y censura a la RPDC.
					
					Los medios de prensa conservadores y otros fulanos y menganos libran una demagogia anti-RPDC, cuya responsabilidad  se debe a EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos que niegan totalmente el sistema de la RPDC y su regimen socialista y recurren a la politica conflictiva sonando con el "derrumbe" de ella.
					
					Esta claro que tales actos provocativos siembran la desconfianza y la hostilidad entre ambas partes coreanas y pueden ser el detonante  que traiga la brusca situacion irreparable entre el Norte y el Sur.
					
					EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas deben reflexionar bien sobre las consecuencias catastroficas que emanen de sus palabras insolentes. 
					
					Pagaran muy caro los que se atreven a difamar la dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC.

articles.title: Tiene lugar XV reunion de copresidencia de APRP
articles.content:
Tiene lugar XV reunion de copresidencia de APRP
						
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 6 a modo de intercambio de mensajes facsimilares la XV reunion de la copresidencia de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria entre el Norte, el Sur y ultramar.
					La reunion discutio el rumbo de actividades de la APRP para glorificar este ano significativo del septuagesimo aniversario de la liberacion de la patria como el de grandes cambios para abrir el ancho camino para la reunificacion independiente. 
					
					En la ocasion hubo el informe.
					
					El informe senala que la APRP condujo en la delantera, sin ninguna vacilacion, el movimiento de todos los connacionales por la reunificacion frustrando los desafios de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion acorde a su responsabilidad y deber asumidos ante la epoca y la nacion.
					
					Puntualiza que la APRP respalda totalmente el llamamiento de la reunion conjunta del gobierno, partidos politicos y entidades de la RPDC que refleja la unanime aspiracion y demanda de todos los connacionales sobre la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas y la reunificacion independiente.
					
					Menciona las tareas y remedios que se presentan en avanzar levantando en alto la consigna "!Abramos un ancho camino para la reunificacion independiente con las fuerzas unidas de toda la nacion en este ano de aniversario 70 de la liberacion de la patria!".
					
					Exhorta a la APRP, que acoge el 25o aniversario de su fundacion, a cumplir con su responsabilidad y honrosa mision de vanguardia de reunificacion de la patria y abanderado de la gran unidad nacional y a coronar este ano como el de grandes virajes en que se abra el ancho camino de reunificacion independiente.
					
					Quedo aprobada en la ocasion una resolucion conjunta.

articles.title: Resolucion conjunta aprobada en la reunion de copresidencia de APRP
articles.content:
Resolucion conjunta aprobada en la reunion de copresidencia de APRP
						
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ACNC) -- Quedo adoptada una resolucion conjunta en la XV reunion de copresidencia de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP) efectuada el dia 6.
					En la resolucion conjunta, las direcciones nortena, surena y ultramarina de la APRP abogaron por avanzar levantando en alto la consigna "!Abramos un ancho camino para la reunificacion independiente con las fuerzas unidas de toda la nacion en este ano del aniversario 70 de la liberacion de la patria!", y prosiguieron:
					
					1. Estrechando las manos con los compatriotas de todos los sectores dentro y fuera del pais, la APRP coronara el 2015 como el ano de ofensiva general, de grandes cambios y de grandes victorias a registrarse en la historia nacional.
					
					   La APRP infundira a los habitantes de diferentes sectores el fuerte espiritu de autoestima, el de conceder primacia a la nacion, segun el cual la nacion es la primera y todo es posible si todos los connacionales unen sus fuerzas y inteligencias. Y promovera activamente la gran unidad de la nacion segun el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					2. La APRP seguira tomando invariablemente como linea vital de reunificacion independiente la Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio, la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, que son la carta y gran programa comunes de reunificacion de la nacion.
					
					   Con motivo del 15o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y el septuagesimo aniversario de la liberacion de la patria, la APRP se esforzara para que se realice sin falta el acto conjunto nacional en que tomaran parte ampliamente todos los sectores del Norte, el Sur y ultramar y lo convertira en la cita pannacional de reunificacion que promovera la gran unidad nacional.
					
					3. La APRP desplegara con dinamismo las actividades por crear el ambiente y clima favorables al mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					   Particularmente, hara ingentes esfuerzos por frenar tajantemente todas las maniobras conflictivas como la calumnia a la dignidad y el regimen de la contraparte, la campana de "DDHH" y el lanzamiento de volantes, que son escollos de la mejora de relaciones Norte-Sur, y se esforzara por la cancelacion de las "medidas del 24 de mayo".
					
					4. La APRP concentrara sus fuerzas en rechazar la guerra y preparar el ambiente pacifico.
					
					   Inmediatamente, se movilizara en la lucha por detener los entrenamientos militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle", desarrollara con osadia la lucha por la retirada de tropas yanquis y rechazara resueltamente la intervencion de las fuerzas extranjeras en asuntos internos de nuestra nacion.
					
					5. La APRP hara frente rotundo a la represion fascista contra las fuerzas patrioticas pro-reunificacion y frenara el intento de disolver por la fuerza la direccion surena de la APRP tildandola de "entidad ilegal y proenemiga".
					
					Al mismo tiempo, se esforzara hasta el final por abolir las infames leyes antinacionales, anti-reunificacion y anti-DDHH incluyendo la "ley de seguridad" y excarcelar a todas las personalidades patrioticas pro-reunificacion, inclusive los miembros de la direccion surena de la APRP detenidos injustamente.

articles.title: Efectuada funcion de grupo central de propaganda artistica juvenil
articles.content:
Efectuada funcion de grupo central de propaganda artistica juvenil
						
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de la fundacion de las fuerzas armadas regulares de Corea, se efectuo hoy en la Casa Central de la Juventud la funcion del grupo central de propaganda artistica juvenil.
					En la escena, iniciada con el coro pequeno "Viva el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung", se presentaron varias piezas incluyendo la narracion poetica "Brillaran para siempre las inmortales hazanas de construccion del ejercito" y el cuarteto femenino "Niliri del Songun".
					
					Los ejecutantes encomiaron las inmortales proezas de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il quienes defendieron firmemente la dignidad y la soberania del pais y prepararon la base de prosperidad de la Corea del Songun al construir las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias regulares.
					
					Demostraron la voluntad y el impetu de los jovenes de exterminar al imperialismo yanqui y la horda traidora surcoreana y cumplir sin falta la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					Se presentaron los programas que mostraron el temperamento de los jovenes de defender a costa de la vida al Mariscal Kim Jong Un y dar los canonazos de victoria en todas las esferas de construccion de un Estado prospero.
					
					Disfrutaron el espectaculo Choe Ryong Hae, secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los funcionarios interesados y los de la Union de la Juventud y los jovenes y estudiantes.

articles.title: Efectuado encuentro de narracion de funcionarias e integrantes de UMDC
articles.content:
Efectuado encuentro de narracion de funcionarias e integrantes de UMDC
						
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 8 de febrero, tuvo lugar el dia 5 en la Casa de la Mujer el encuentro de narracion sobre el noble virtud del Presidente Kim Il Sung de las funcionarias e integrantes de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea.
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung proclamo el 8 de febrero del 37 (1948) de la Era Juche la fundacion de las fuerzas armadas regulares de Corea.
					
					En el encuentro, Kang Yong Hwa, hija de Kang Kon, combatiente revolucionario antijapones, relato que el Presidente cumplio con exito en un periodo corto la causa de construccion de las fuerzas armadas regulares considerando los asuntos presentados en la construccion del ejercito como los mas importantes despues de la liberacion de la patria.
					
					Ella menciono que gracias a la confianza del Presidente, su padre asumio a los 30 anos de edad el importante cargo de jefe del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea y tuvo el honor de mandar las filas de desfile militar en el dia de declaracion del nacimiento de las fuerzas armadas regulares.
					
					Sim Kyong Suk, medica de la Policlinica de Puksae del municipio de Moranbong, conto que gracias a los grandes hombres del monte Paektu, su suegro Ri Hwal, Heroe de la Republica, se formo como funcionario benemerito que dejo sus huellas en la historia de las fuerzas aereas.
					
					La veterana de guerra, Rim Chan Ju, dijo que durante la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, los soldados ordinarios se formaron como heroes de combate y contribuyeron mucho a la victoria de guerra, bajo la direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung, y canto la cancion "Mi esposo se hizo heroe".
					
					Al final, las oradoras destacaron que las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de Corea guiadas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un saldran siempre victoriosas tomando como maxima de su vida la defensa a ultranza al Lider.
